General.Name: Xianhe Co Ltd
General.Description: Xianhe Co., Ltd. develops and produces specialty papers, pulps, paper products, and related chemical additives in China and internationally. Its products portfolio includes tobacco industry paper, home decoration paper, business communication and anti- counterfeiting paper, food and medical packing paper, heat transfer base paper, label release paper, low quantitative publishing and printing paper, electrical and industrial paper, and specialty pulp products. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Quzhou, China. Xianhe Co.,Ltd. is a subsidiary of Zhejiang Xianhe Holdings Co., Ltd.
General.Address: No. 69, Tianhu South Road, Quzhou, China, 324022
